Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: Welcome to the world my friend! Your journey has been long and you are soon due a rest.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: You are known as Jaque Blaque, a traveling bard.

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: You travel where the wind takes you, spinning tales, defending your honor, and the honor of beautiful young maidens!

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: On this day you come across a tavern during your travels called The Empty Flask

Dialogue.Speaker: narator
Dialogue.Text: Here you stop for a well deserved drink...
CRASH!!!
EEEEK!

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: I told you already!

Dialogue.Speaker: barmaid
Dialogue.Text: You have had enough tonight, you are cut off!!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: You can't cut me off, you wench!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: I'll drink myself 'till I drown if I please it!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: Now get me another drink before I get rough!!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Oh, My!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: What seems to be the problem sir?

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Certainly want for a drink wouldn't push you to speak so callously to this lovely young bar maid!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: Piss off!!

Dialogue.Speaker: enemy1
Dialogue.Text: A mare's arse, such as yourself, hasn't any place in this tavern!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: Such vulgairty!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: I would defend her honor, and mine!

Dialogue.Speaker: player
Dialogue.Text: You half witted swine!
